10/10. One of my favorite games of all time with one of the most fun mechanics you'll find in a videogame. The story is great and its followed up in a great way in the second game. I highly recommend this to anyone who enjoys puzzle games. Story is short, so you can get through it pretty quick if you know what you're doing.

Portal is a classic puzzle game that still holds up extremely well today. The gameplay is not too challenging, but using the portal gun to your advantage and completing each puzzle still seems satisfying. The atmosphere is also very well-done, it feels very alive even though there are no other human characters. The story is not too complex, but it was interesting enough to keep pushing me forward. There are not many characters, but GLaDOS adds plenty of humor to each level. My only complaint is that the main game only took me about 2 hours, but itâ€™s surely a game that Iâ€™ll never forget.
